response.original_title: The Best of Montreux Jazz Festival
response.overview: Many, many great names this year. Among the artists from the United Kingdom, you will be able to go to concerts by Amy Macdonald, Chris Rea, Temples, Passenger, Robert Plant and his band the Sensational Space Shifters, Metronomy, Jungle, London Grammar, Goldfrapp, Massive Attack, Jamie Cullum, Paloma Faith, Michael Kiwanuka, Damon Albarn, Babyshambles, Morcheeba and Ed Sheeran. Like every year, the festival aims to be very select: expect to see the prices go up for the headliners.
response.title: The Best of Montreux Jazz Festival
